Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Aelo was in stasis lock, she was damaged but she'd survive. Ocipite 
was half awake but the pain and the weakness didn't let her defend 
herself. Celeno was severy damaged, acyd was destroying inside her 
body and if that conitnue she could die.

That was the information that Wheeljack could get with his scanners
